EmailTemplate.name: Accelerating Digital Drip V1.Send Email #2.Email 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Digital Banking Awareness Toolkit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Digital Banking Awareness Kit ${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> You’re committed to providing fast, safe and reliable banking services. But are your customers aware of all the self-service capabilities you have to offer?
We’ve created a free toolkit with over a dozen customizable ads, social posts, printable assets and more—so you can easily communicate your digital banking services when they’re needed most.
It’s just one of the ways we’re helping our clients, and {{company.Company Name:default=your financial institution}}, stay connected to their customers in times of need. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Did you know?
You can get free marketing campaign toolkits, customizable campaigns, videos, research reports and more to help {{company.Company Name:default=you}} differentiate with digital. Start here <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/digital-banking/2020/digital-transformation?utm_source=outbound_email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=acceleratingdigital&utm_content=email1&utm_industry=digital-banking]]>.
